Other Details: Dhemaji - Anganwadi Centres Affected | Today on 10/06/2022, No 2 Baruah 1 no. of AWC of Baruah Lalung submerged due to flood water,  Sissiborgaon - Washed away Culverts | As on 10/06/2022, 1 no. of culvert was damaged on Lahram khuti to Chekaimajgaon road at Ch 500.0 M
